div.#text: (Effect: When you play a building tag, you pay 2 megacredit less for it.)

span.@style: color:red;border:4px solid red;border-radius:50%;padding:3px 5px 3px 5px;font-size:30px;line-height:14px;box-shadow: 3px 3px 3px grey, inset 0 0 3px 3px grey;text-shadow: 3px 3px 3px grey;

div.#text: (Effect: When you play an Earth tag, including this, draw a card.)
(Action: Spend 4 megacredit to increase (one of) your LOWESTprod 1 step.)
(Effect: When you play an Science tag, you pay 2megacredit less for it.)
(You start with 37 megacredit. As your first action, draw 3 Prelude cards, and play one of them. Discard the other two.)
(Effect: When you play a card with a NON-NEGATIVE VP icon, including this, gain 3megacredit.)
(You start with 45 megacredit. As your first action, fund an award for free.)
(When you get a new type of tag in play (event cards do not count), increase your megacreditprod 1 step.)

span.@style: background:linear-gradient(to bottom right, green, yellow, red)

div.#text: (You start with 40megacredit. As your first action add a colony tile.)

#text: (Effect: When you play an animal or plant tag, including

div.#text: (You start with 45 megacredit. Increase your megacreditprod 2 steps. 1 VP per 2 animals on this card.)
(Effect: When you buy a card to hand, pay 5megacredit instead of 3, including the starting hand.)
(You start with 50megacredit. Increase your megacreditprod 5 steps. Gain 5 titanium.)
(Effect: When any colony is placed, including this, raise your megacreditprod 1 step.)
(You start with 45megacredit. As your first action, place a colony.)

#text: (Action: Add a floater to ANY card.
Effect: Floaters on this card may be used as 2 heat each.)

div.#text: (Effect: When any ocean tile is placed, increase your megacreditprod 1 step. Your bonus for placing adjacent to oceans is 3megacredit instead of 2megacredit.)

#text: (Effect: Duringprod phase, if you did not get TR so far this
(You start with 53 megacredit. Decrease your TR 2 steps.

div.#text: (Action: Gain 2megacredit for EACH PARTY WHERE YOU HAVE AT LEAST 1 DELEGATE.)
(You start with 36 megacredit. When you perform an action, the wild tag counts as any tag of your choice.)
(You start with 14 megacredit. Lower your TR 1 step.)
(Action: Decrease anyprod to gain 4 resources of that kind.)
(You start with 40 megacredit. Increase your steel and titaniumprod 1 step each.)
(Action: Increase your energyprod 1 step IF YOU HAVE NO ENERGY RESOURCES, or spend 3megacredit to draw a building card.)
(You start with 37 megacredit. Increase your steelprod 1 step.)

(Effect: When a player causes another player to decreaseprod or lose resources, pay 3megacredit to the victim,
                or as much as possible.)

(You start with 48 megacredit. Increase your megacreditprod 4 steps. ALL OPPONENTS DECREASE THEIR megacreditprod 2 STEPS.
              THIS DOES NOT TRIGGER THE EFFECT BELOW.)
(Effect: Each new adjacency between your tile and an opponent's tile gives you a standard resource of your choice (regardless of who just placed a tile).)
(You start with 47 megacredit. As your first action, place a greenery tile and raise the oxygen 1 step.)
ACTION: PLACE A PLAYER MARKER ON A NON-RESERVED AREA ADJACENT TO ONE OF YOUR TILES OR MARKED AREAS
EFFECT: MARKED AREAS ARE RESERVED FOR YOU. WHEN YOU PLACE A TILE THERE, GAIN 3 megacredit

#text: AS YOUR FIRST ACTION, PLACE A COMMUNITY (PLAYER MARKER) ON A NON-RESERVED AREA.)

div.#text: (Effect: When you play a building tag, including this, gain 1 microbe to this card, or remove 2 microbes here and raise your plantprod 1 step.)
(Effect: when a microbe tag is played, incl. this, THAT PLAYER gains 2 megacredit, or adds a microbe to THAT card, and you gain 2 megacredit.)
(You start with 44 megacredit. As your first action, reveal cards until you have revealed a microbe tag. Take that card into hand, and discard the rest.)
(Action: Either add 1 asteroid to ANY CARD or gain any standard resource OR remove 1 asteroid here to gain 3 titanium.)
(You start with 38megacredit, and 3 asteroid resources here.)

(Effect: When ANY microbe is played, including these, add a disease here and lose 4megacredit or as much as possible.
                When you play a science tag, remove 1 disease
(You start with 54 megacredit. Draw a science card.)
